website_summaries.verdict: This product earns praise for making most stains and odors disappear completely, but the scent may be too strong for some.
pros: Formulated to be safe and effective on all types of pet stains and odors
A percentage of sales goes to help animal causes
cons: You might have to apply this several times on stubborn odors like cat urine
Scent may be a bit strong for some users

customer_reviews.title: Miracle product
customer_reviews.text: In our new house we had two spots that smelled cat urine, and when I say smelled I mean reeked, made you throw up bad. Our house is over 5000 sqft and you could smell it from the other end. Urine was soaked in to carpet, padding, subfloors and everything. At one point I was thinking it was either a house cat with huge bladder or a small tiger. My wife used our commercial carpet steamer, I pulled the carpet and cut the padding, nothing helped until this thing came along. Literally in 2 hours smell was gone and it stayed that way after 2 weeks as I write this report. Best money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best product on the market for pet stains.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing can get rid of pet urine smells like this product can. I have literally used a ton of natures miracle on a couch that my pet peed on and it still smelled like pee. I shampooed it with a shampooer and still the smell remained. I ordered this product and with one application the smell was gone. My sister also used it for cat urine and it was the only thing that got out even set in urine smells. Everyone with a cat knows how hard it can be to get cat urine out of things and this stuff works.
customer_reviews.author: Litljewels

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, works great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works sooooo well. I have tried many other brands of pet stain remover, and this one is definitely the best. I have two indoor cats with hairball issues; they are often spitting up hairballs, or stomach acid only before or after the passing of the hairball. (Sorry for the TMI.) Of course, they only want to do this on the carpet and rugs. This stain remover effectively removes the bodily fluid, hairball, etc. with a nice, fresh minty scent and no sticky residue. I keep a bottle upstairs and downstairs so I don't have to go hunting for it during those 2AM hairball vomiting sessions (because, of course, that's the only time they want to throw up).
customer_reviews.author: Heather Coburn-SchillTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I’ve tried several other stain removers & they appear to work at first but then the spots come back just as bad. I ordered the stain remover & the remover ...
customer_reviews.text: My bedroom carpet is so covered with spots from my male dog who constantly pees I’m embarrassed to death to have anyone over. I’ve tried several other stain removers & they appear to work at first but then the spots come back just as bad. I ordered the stain remover & the remover for carpet cleaners. I used the stain remover to spot clean first. Had to do two applications, the stains were so bad but the results are amazing! I haven’t cleaned the carpet with the cleaner yet because I’m waiting to see if I need to spot clean again. So far so good!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah E.

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders on spilled milk in hot cars..
customer_reviews.text: My son left a half gallon of milk in the car.. We live in FL.. its hot. The milk exploded under the passenger seat. SMELLED sooooo awful.. We used cleaners baking soda vinegar 2 other enzyme cleaners. As soon as they dried the awful tangy smell was right back. I bought this product as a last ditch effort.. It worked. No more milk smell. It has a strong smell when first applied but as it dries the smell goes away.. A+ in my book
customer_reviews.author: staci

customer_reviews.title: Terrible smell
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to assume this product works, though I don't yet know. However, the fragrance is an awful chemical smell that takes a week to get rid of, especially in the winter when I can't open all the doors and windows. I somehow thought since the description said all natural enzymes, that the fragrance would be natural as well. Too bad I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stinks to high heaven
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells absolutely awful and the smell never seems you go away. We've aired out the room for days and this smell is worse than the one we were trying to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: overpowering fragrance
customer_reviews.text: The cleaner does kill the cat pee smell, and then some. The artificial smell is so overpowering, I can't smell anything but the cleaner for days after using it (and ventilating the area well, even in freezing winter temperatures), which gives me headaches. If you are used to the smell of typical fabric softener and dryer sheets on daily basis, this product may not bother you. But for someone who sticks to perfume-free or lightly and naturally scented soaps and detergents, the intensity of this cleaner's fragrance will likely be a huge turn-off, so consider it with caution.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: which I like. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I have several geriatric incontinent dogs that I have resigned myself to cleaning up after (diapers don't work...). I have tried every cleaner I could think of, including bleach, industrial grout cleaner, and other enzyme cleaners but could NEVER get the urine stands out of my grout. One - ONE - application of this product and the grout just...whitened. For the first time in MONTHS, my house doesn't have an underlying "dog" odor. It smells lightly of mint, which I like. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Three Bands

customer_reviews.title: Stain where?!
customer_reviews.text: It really worked on my stain. One of my cats did not like the food that I bought. She vomited three hair balls along with food in my brand new carpet that I just got installed. I ordered this and it came in the next day. I followed the directions to a t and it worked 😺😻.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cubed

customer_reviews.title: It's the Best
customer_reviews.text: I have very, very pale wall-to-wall carpeting__ the preferred toilet, apparently, of my last eight dogs. As a result, over thirty-some years, I've tried EVERY product on the market and replaced the same carpet twice. Sunny and Honey, amazingly, has come up with the only stain remover I've tried that works. Really. It works!!! Although I know where the stains once were, I simply don't see them anymore. So after years of owning dogs, buying carpets, (and forgetting to close the bedroom door) I have a solution. At last. In more ways than one.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Prisant

customer_reviews.title: I put the product down by hand and used a carpet cleaning machine to suck it up
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely stay away from this product. I bought it, left a comment that I would not buy again. It worked for smell but not stain and their customer service said I didn't read the directions properly, of which I most certainly did. I put the product down by hand and used a carpet cleaning machine to suck it up. They "claimed" I didn't do it right and it was my fault for not getting the results that I should have gotten, and then decided not to make my comments public.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: It has very STRONG smell! I don't have a good nose either but the smell is unbearable! I bought this to remove stains under the UV light which didn't work at all. I cleaned it at the area where my dogs always marks at but he continues to mark there again. You're basically paying $20 for a freshener. I have no idea why there's so much good reviews for. I don't even write reviews
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Removed urine smell and stopped the animals from urinating on my carpet!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly a miracle worker. I have two dogs and two cats and they would not stop urinating on my carpet and no matter what I used, I couldn't get the smell out. And I'm a clean freak so I was using my carpet cleaner every week and it STILL didn't stop them. This product not only got the smell out, but they don't urinate on my carpet anymore! Truly an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! I’ve tried multiple ways to get rid of pet odors. All just covered the smell but this actually got rid of the odor. It took several applications but the odor is now gone! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: LynCam

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best! I’ve used quite a few different products for pet stains and this is truly the best. The stains start to fade instantly and the scent is pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: This is a Must-Have for Pet Owners!
customer_reviews.text: I got a new dog that loved to mark his territory before we could get him neutered. He peed ALL OVER our carpeted apartment. Combined with a blacklight flashlight, I was able to find all of the spots and use the spray. The odor and stains completely disappeared after 2 applications for the trickiest stains, and only 1 for light ones. I have purchased a huge jug of this because I love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Cy

customer_reviews.title: kills Pet Odors
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. Easy spray bottle. Have only ised on hard surfaces, not fabric. Would buy this again. Remaining odor is pleasant and clean smelling, not perfume-like.
customer_reviews.author: susan c boyer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! We tried everything to get out the urine smell from our new couch, but nothing worked. One application of this and the smell was gone. I couldn’t believe it.
customer_reviews.author: NaddyGabby143

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: If you have an animal this is a must have. The only cleaner I've ever found that truly works!!
customer_reviews.author: JC in Texas

customer_reviews.title: This product is incredible!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! No more odor from our cat trying to think SHE is the alpha female over our chocolate lab in the house. I didn't think I would ever get the odor out of our lab's bed and have tried everything. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: happyconsumer

customer_reviews.title: Best pet cleaner out there
customer_reviews.text: I had a pet stain that I tried everything to remove the yellowish vomit stain from the middle to my rug. Got the awesome cleaner and proof gone. And all i did was spray the stain good making sure it had a good dampness and walked away. No rubbing No scrubbing. Just goodbye stain. A+
customer_reviews.author: Margaret D.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a product that works
customer_reviews.text: My 2 chihuahuas sometimes mark their spots in the house. Cleaning products do not works on their keen noses so this is awesome to use. It smells great and works great I spray it all around the bottom of furniture and no staining
customer_reviews.author: Stacy B.

customer_reviews.title: DISGRACEFUL FRAUD
customer_reviews.text: This product is a fraud. It pretends to be an enzyme neutralizer of pet urine. But instead it is an artificially scented fluid that stinks to high heaven in an effort to cover up urine smells. I used it as directed on a urine stain left by my new puppy. Days later I can still smell the urine, and in addition the chemical "fragrance" is irritating my eyes and stinking up my office to the point of making the office unusable. Please be warned --this product is a fraud.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Odell

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical smell is overwhelming
customer_reviews.text: The product has a very strong chemical smell!! After I sprayed spots on my carpet with the product, the chemical smell was overwhelming. Had to open my doors to ventilate my house. I followed the instructions and afterwards the spots were a little lighter but still visible. I’m going to try again to get the “Pee” spots of my carpet. I hope it will work better if I leave the solution over night. I read all reviews and was hopeful this would get rid of my problem. I’m very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: S. Browning

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my carpets
customer_reviews.text: First off I have only one elderly dog who has accidents. This product worked to remove the stains she left. I thought great but a month later Not so great the smell and stains are back with a vengeance. The scent of the product is a bit much for me but it originally removed the stains so I put up with it. Now the stains and odors are back. And she still has accidents in the same location. This was used in a rug doctor pro carpet cleaner which I own so I’ve used this carpet cleaner before. This enzyme just didn’t work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Kills the odor almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: I had a German Shepard puppy who had a tendency to pee in the house if I did not move quick enough to let her out. I cleaned the floors immediately and thought I was good. When the hot weather came I learned the hard way, not so much. My house reeked, it was absolutely awful. I read the reviews for this product online, ordered it, used it, and I'm ecstatic, the smell is gone. There is no overwhelming chemical smell at all after you use it. I have linoleum floors and there were no signs of staining or glue disintegrating. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: collegekid28

customer_reviews.title: Great scent!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for pet odors but one dog does sneeze when I use it. However I am pleased with the fresh scent in the house after spraying it. Make the house have a fresh scent clean scent again.
customer_reviews.author: K Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!
customer_reviews.text: We had a very bad cat urine problem on our wall-to-wall carpeting. It covered a large area up against the walls. We primed and painted the walls, and we sprayed this product on the carpet and pad and where the wall meets the carpet and pad so it could also reach the tack strips. This is the only product I've found that removes all of the cat odor.
customer_reviews.author: suzimi

customer_reviews.title: WORKS PERFECTLY!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I have two kittens at home and not only do they poop outside the litter box at times, but also occasionally barf on my carpet :( I previously used Woolite (NOT good)...it bleached out parts of my carpet when I used too much. However, this product does not. It practically makes the stains disappear no matter how deep it is! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Ueno

customer_reviews.title: horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my car and I cant get the smell out. It has been over a month. I was complaining it didnt work and that it still smelled then my husband pointed out that it wasnt the pee I could still smell. It masked the pee smell. The strong smell now is from the cleaner. I went back to the bottle and sure enough it is. I immediately threw it away. I also had to throw away the vinyl cat carrier and car seat cover. I think I will have to professionally clean the car to get out smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really works to take the odor out of carpet
customer_reviews.text: I have a Dog with a bladder problem & I have been searching for something for a long time that will get the pee and odor out of my carpet. This stuff works like a charm! I can’t believe how well it works. I will continue to buy this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Anni

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME if you have a new puppy!
customer_reviews.text: This smells great and works! Going to reorder a gallon size!
customer_reviews.author: sunkitty

customer_reviews.title: ... the room with the dog in it to a nice smelling room
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and changed the room with the dog in it to a nice smelling room.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan C. GreifingerTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a tricky problem
customer_reviews.text: Pets are a joy, but can be frustrating when it comes to their messes. I was looking for something to help with a male dog marking and a cat with a hair ball problem. I found this product helped to eliminate the stain and odors. No more marking in those spots. The odor of the spray is minty and can be a bit strong but does go away. It’s definitely a better product than anything else I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! So glad you sell it on GALLONS! 😒😖
customer_reviews.text: It definitely works, but sometimes it takes A LOT - but if you think about it, it only makes sense because it needs to soak down to the bottom of the carpet to get to where the problem is. Overall I think it's definitely helped, but I still seem to smell some of the urine smell, but chances are that I'm probably not using the product to its full potential so that is probably my fault. I'm definitely happy I purchased this in such a large quantity because MY MOTHERFATHER DOG WON'T STOP PEEING ON MY FLOCKING BRAND NEW CARPET! CHEESE AND CRACKERS EVERYBODY! 🤬
customer_reviews.author: Morganational

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is not easy on your phone. 3rd try. Awesome product, works well on pet stains and has a really nice smell. Since it worked so well on stains, I tried it on a 2 yr old stain of Koolaid powder on a fabric ottoman. Nothing has worked. This took two applications but stain is gone. Pictures show the cleaning cloth with the lifted stain and the stain free furniture. Its still a little damp so shows up darker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I know your desperate, but don't buy this snake oil!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff left a nasty new odor that deterred all the humans but hasn't bothered the cat. I've been using a Bissel shop-vac style carpet cleaner every weekend for a month to get the smell of this stuff out. The bottle it comes in is so cheaply made then neck actually bends when squeezing the trigger. This is a money maker for the manufacturer but useless for you & me.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Horrid smell, hardly effective
customer_reviews.text: Truly horrid smell, I tried this as an alternative to Nature’s Miracle now that it has a new and stronger scent but wow this did not work out at all. Needed to clean up a dog feces accident and it has left a major residue and added its own horrendous odor to the mix which, as others have noted, gets worse over the next day or two. Hard to tell which smells worse. Got out the carpet shampooer and it took 4 passes over the area over 2 days, including a last-ditch application of Nature’s Miracle (which is what I’m trying to replace, but it’s what finally cleared it up), to get it back to a tolerable state.
customer_reviews.author: M. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. It gets rid of the Oder better than any other product i have tried. My room kept smelling like urine and i could not get the smell out and i saw this was a good product so i tried it and it worked great i will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: August

customer_reviews.title: This stuff may work but I am sensitive to some ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff may work but I am sensitive to some fragrances and it"s musky peppermint smell gives me a migrane headache. I wish I could return it as it took me longer than the return window to figure this out. I am going to go back to nature's miracle which in my opinion has a nonlingering smell (UNLIKE THIS PRODUCT). It may work ok but the smell lingers forever reminding me of what was there to cover it up.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lampe

customer_reviews.title: It really worked!!!
customer_reviews.text: We had our carpets cleaned by a professional and a few weeks later started noticing old pee spots from the dog. Tried this and it worked great! Just, liberally, spray spot, wait 10 to 15 minutes and soak up. No scrubbing was needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bleached my carpet
customer_reviews.text: At 1st I thought this was working great. I let the product sit like the instructions said. The next day I noticed that areas of my carpet where I the treated spots were much lighter than my normal carpet color. I was so disappointed & frustrated. My carpet wasn’t dirty and we only had a few spots where our new 2lb puppy had pottied. But now I will have to replace my bedroom carpet because of the bleached spots. I didn’t care for the smell of the cleaner either.
customer_reviews.author: KimB

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible and does not work!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot for the life of me understand how there could be any positive reviews for this product. It smells AWFUL. Worse than any other odors you are trying to get rid of. The smell of the product is so strong that I coughed for days after using it. I'm also convinced it made my cat sick. DO NOT USE!! I had to carpet clean my carpets multiple times to finally get rid of the smell of this product and it still lingers. All it did was create extra work for us, cause me to have breathing/coughing issues and did not even solve our original problem!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! It seriously works, it smells really clean too. I have a puppy and this has helped so much with the urine smell!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Magic liquid
customer_reviews.text: My dog got sick on a carpeted room in multiple places. Other cleaners didn’t work. This product actually visibly cleaned the carpet and it smelled good. That dog passed away and I got a puppy who still was able to smell another dog was in the room before him, so he would pee in that room. I was happy with the results, but since my dog has further initiated the carpet, I plan to avoid the problem altogether and replace it with laminate flooring. No complaints on the product. I was able to keep the carpet a year longer thanotherwise would have.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Schardt

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this product, it did everything it advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Sprau

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have one pet that likes to mark all over the place. We were truly becoming accustomed to the urine smell in our home, but we knew the odor was there and visitors noticed it too. I bought this hoping it would work where others have failed. Following the bottle instructions is important here because you want to let this have time to work in the door and stain before you blot it up. It really does work and the urine smell had been removed. We did follow up with a carpet cleaning machine because some areas were so badly stained and it worked great as a precaution treatment for the deep cleaning machine.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing, hard core stain remover
customer_reviews.text: I love this spray. The scent is awesome (including the limited edition pumpkin spice!) and it's AMAZING at getting stains out, even really deep-seated ones. The scent is a little strong first and you may need to open some windows while it gets to work; inhaling it at that time will burn your lungs. But once it settles down enough for you to dry the area/remove the stain, it's fine to breathe in. They've earned a customer. My only complaint is that the first time I received this product, the nozzle was broken and I had to return the product for a new one... but no issues since! I still recommend in spite of that initial bad experience.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Discolors carpet when used as directed
customer_reviews.text: Left discoloring in carpet when used as directed. See image. Other similar products I have used in the same manner (e.g. Arm and Hammer brand) are more effective and have not messed up my carpet.
customer_reviews.author: DMJP

customer_reviews.title: Bought again😡
customer_reviews.text: Well, stupidly I bought this again! I managed using an exact knife to get the sprayer away from the shrink wrap! I thought yeah-success-but NO!!! When I twirled to use the sprayer it squirted but mostly on my hand. Tried getting the top off as I did last tie-but NO, EVEN WITH PLIERS it won’t come off! Live the product but all I do is waste it. I just want to SCREAM, but I’ve already have cussed it! Guess I’ll try the gallon and see if it’s useable 🤬
customer_reviews.author: Asta & Radomir’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Big miracle in a small bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I love it! We adopted (actually found on the street) a grown puppy. I don't think she was house trained, even though she is a purebred pit-bull. She used to pee on the rug. I tried everything, from washing it with soap and soda to eliminate odors to flipping the corners of the rug so she won't go on it. She would pee everywhere. As soon as we sprayed this Miracle, she stopped peeing on the rug (she did pee on the bathroom rug, he-he). I am really happy with the product. It does have a smell, not horrible, not pleasant, it's just there, but goes away rather quickly. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: anita belokopytova

customer_reviews.title: Effective - and smells nice
customer_reviews.text: After watching several episodes of "Psycho Kitty" ( and seeing enzyme cleaners recommended, I decided to give this one a try. I have used enzyme cleaners in the past and found them messy and odd smelling. I really like this one. It is easy to use, seems to be quite effective, and it has a pleasant smell. UPDATE: Like this product so much I bought a second bottle. Don't need it yet, but like to have a back up of my favorite products on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Wholly Piecemeal

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: If you are at all sensitive to odors and fragrance, stay away from this stuff. The smell of this solution is sickening. After trying it on three dog urine spots in my living room, the smell was so overwhelming that I had to rent an industrial carpet shampooer to get this and the remaining dog urine out of the rug. Now the rug smells like nothing- as a rug should.
customer_reviews.author: rpatrick

customer_reviews.title: IT REALLY WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that you posted in our Seller Feedback: " My bunny Buddy Had a bad reaction to antibiotics up until that time he never pooped anywhere except in his pee tray after that he never went in the pee tray and it was a mess for months so I got this the other day sprayed it on there and he’s going in his pee tray again like a miracle "
customer_reviews.author: pereira68

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: While this seems pricey I have to say that this is the best stain remover for pet stains I have tried. We have bunnies who have great litter habits, however, as they age those habits get less perfect. This helps up keep our home smelling like we don't even have pets and gets rid of most stains. If a stain appears, gets ignored, and peed on again I don't think this can treat at that sort of deep level...but for us it's ideal. I think this would perform amazingly with a steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Srae

customer_reviews.title: Been using this for 3 years now
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many pet cleaners and finally found one that works on everything I have tried. Not only does this get rid of stubborn stains but it also gets down into the carpet pad (if you put enough on) and totally eliminates the smell (ex: urine). Would highly recommend. Definitely worth trying!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner, faulty spray
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this stain and odor remover twice and each time, there's been a problem with the sprayer. The first time, I couldn't twist the end to get the sprayer to work so I poured the contents into an empty spray bottle. The second time, the trigger/nozzle attachment leaks so my hand is soaking wet after 2-3 sprays. The actual enzyme cleaning solution works great and leaves the area smelling clean.
customer_reviews.author: PVKat

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff work great! My dog unfortunately has been peeing in my appartment. His usual pee spot was the couch. It smell so bad, you could smell his pee all the time when you sat the couch. I tried a lot of things to get rid of the smell but it didnt work. But this spray took away the smell. I did have to soak the pee areas a couple of times but it took the smell out completely! When you do spray it, it does have a very strong chemical smell so you'll have to air out the chemical smell but the product is worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Selena Salas

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Cat urinated in laundry room. Didn't think I'd ever get smell out of grout bit, this worked perfectly. One tip- use sparingly at first. It was stronger than I thought and I may have sprayed too much first time. It was strong and I had to air out room. But, urine smell gone.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Cat Pee
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in a panic. My cats unfortunately peed in many spots in my apartment that I was renting. I got a quote from a carpet cleaner that said it would be $1200 to clean. As bad as it might be, I just needed to get rid of the smell to get my security deposit back. I bought this on a whim and long story short I got the deposit back. It has a VERY strong scent to the point where I had to open the windows when using a lot, but lifted the smell better than anything else Ive ever used. Still use it to get hair ball spots of the ground too. Highly recommend for spraying solution.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was REALLY hoping this would prevent my 14 week old puppy to NOT pee on the carpet again. Used as directly, even waited an extra hour to make sure it was dry. LOVE the smell, much better than a chemically carpet cleaner smell (even my husband commented on it smelling nice). HATE the fact that my puppy walked right back to the carpet within an hr and peed right on it again. The only plus side is that now I have a cleaner that smells nice BUT doesn’t seem to prevent additional accidents on the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Doodle

customer_reviews.title: The overpowering smell burns my eyes and throat.
customer_reviews.text: I just applied it liberally to a 3 foot strip of baseboard and carpet because my dog peed there. The smell is so strong and overpowering. It smells like a combination of toothpaste, cedar chips, and chemicals. Being in my one bedroom apartment after spraying this is excruciating, even with windows open and fans running. Breathing it in burns my throat like I’m breathing in bleach fumes, and it burns my eyes, too. I hate it. But I gave it 2 stars because I don’t know yet how long this unbearable smell will last or whether or not it got rid of the urine scent.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie M

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product and was very disappointed in the results. First off, the bottle leaked regardless of how much I tried to tighten it. I used the product on dog urine on carpet and saw very little improvement. In addition, the carpet was lightened slightly. Will not use again.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya L. Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Magic in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. For the first time in a year the upstairs den has been odorless. There was a period of time when one of the cats repeatedly urinated on the carpet and wall. I’ve deep shampooed the carpet multiple times and washed the walls with only the slightest reduction in odor. I sprayed this one time 4 days ago and it has been odor free since!! Absolute miracle! I chose the fall scent, it smells similar to a cinnamon aerosol bathroom spray.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Does what it states!
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased several bottles of this over the course of 2 years when we just got our two golden retriever puppies. It does exactly what it states. It thoroughly cleans soiled areas, removes odors and I do think the enzymes completely eliminated any residual scents as my puppies never went in the same spot after I applied this cleaner. Totally saved my sanity these past two years!
customer_reviews.author: Erin A. OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Sunny & Honey Pet Stain & Odor Remover, Enzyme Cleaner REALLY Works!
customer_reviews.text: We have three medium sized dogs and three cats. With a group like that, there are bound to be "accidents" and even some that are not quite so "accidental"! Sunny & Honey really works on pet odors. It doesn't just mask the odor with an over abundance of fragrance, but cuts through pet urine to eliminate the odor at the source. Sunny & Honey has a light clean fragrance. We have used others in the past, including Ozone. I much prefer Sunny & Honey: it works and smells great. I highly recommend Sunny & Honey for pet stain and odor removal!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Gisle

customer_reviews.title: This product has a terrible and pervasive smell
customer_reviews.text: This product has a terrible and pervasive smell. I tried it once and threw the product away. The smell was very strong and went into other rooms. i regret buying this. A complete waste.
customer_reviews.author: Iliazd

customer_reviews.title: Passes the blacklight test
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this stuff since I tried to apply it on an old stain that I had already tried to steam clean and used Resolve on, and the stain didn't come out. I thought it was an issue with this product, but the product says that it won't work if the spot has already been treated. Oh well. BUT it does work on fresh stains - dog vomit and urine. Cannot see where the dog had issues once you apply this cleaner. I don't love the smell but it works!
customer_reviews.author: KathyP

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY something that works!
customer_reviews.text: We have an older cat that sometimes pee pees inappropriately whenever there is a change in the dynamics of our household. She typically does it in our basement, which is completely finished and carpeted, but being a basement, the humidity and moisture tend to be higher. That being the case, at times, the residual smells become worse. We have tried practically every product on the market, but nothing has worked...until we tried this product. It has totally eliminated the smell. My basement smells clean and fresh, with absolutely no trace of that urine/ammonia smell. I would definitely recommend this product. So glad I tried yet another product, but this one will be my last.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A

customer_reviews.title: It works so well
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I discovered this product. I have three Maltese Poodles and white carpeting. I have tried competitors and none work as well. I would say the only drawback is the scent is quite strong which does dissipate over time. I even use it on the drapes and some stains on clothing that goes into the washing machine! Works much better than laundry spot remover.
customer_reviews.author: SCG it suited my purpose perfectly.  i think it depeneds if the lids have a lip on them or how big they are..But for my use it is great.  i bought 2.

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick
customer_reviews.text: So I didn’t use this to get rid of a urine odor so much for me, more for my cat. He previously had a uti and was going everywhere and I tried EVERYTHING to get him to stop in these two spots he could still somehow smell his urine in. Finally I used this thing in ONE DAY and he’s stopped completely. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: maddie

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I have 5 doggos in my home so needless to say, accidents happen. I haven't found any other product that do as well of a job as this one! I clean my carpet, rugs and even furniture with this stuff! It works amazing, comes clean and leaves a fresh smelling scent afterwards! If you have pets who mark territory or have accidents i highly recommend this odor and stain remover!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Stock

customer_reviews.title: This product is not safe to use on dark carpets
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on Amazon's recommendation and the many positive reviews. I used it on a dark carpet after my dog had an accident and I should have just used dish soap and water, because now my brand-new carpet is ruined with a dark stain that was left by the product. While there is no trace of urine, nor is there any evidence of original spot, the larger stain from the product is irreversible and I am very upset. This was a perfect, brand-new, custom carpet that I waited months for and now it is, to put it politely, very imperfect.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Binder

customer_reviews.title: Best urine odor remover on the market!!!
customer_reviews.text: The absolutely best product I've found for removing the smell of cat urine!! I. Have two kitties who mark in the house, and this is the ONLY product that has helped me get rid of the odor, and it seems to have helped lessen the frequency of them spraying!! I've also used it in the bathroom whenever my two boys "miss" the toilet bowl. I LOVE this product, and highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Zirkle

customer_reviews.title: 100% Great!
customer_reviews.text: We rescue cats that have been dumped or mistreated and train them to live indoors. Cat accidents happen and cat pee smells horrible. I rely on Sunny and Honey to remove the odor. It works! We also have a sweet elderly and very large dog. When he has an accident in the house it works on dog pee too. My house smells clean and fresh. Buy it, you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: WOW, just WOW!
customer_reviews.text: This product far surpasses ANY other stain and odor removing product. Literally upon application the stain was gone. Not minutes and without scrubbing. As the product was sprayed on the stain disappeared. The scent is very pleasant. Not the “oh my dog or cat peed of poohed on the carpet again” smell. A clean light mint scent. I will be recommending this to all of my pet lover friends, of which I have many.
customer_reviews.author: Linda McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be working well
customer_reviews.text: The urine stains made by our older adopted male appear to be gone. I questioned whether the strong scent was just covering up the smell, but after two weeks, he hasn't peed in the same spot again. I did make a couple moves recommended on the web: moving the box closer to where the urine stains were and adding an oversized litter box to encourage proper behavior. However, I do feel the product has been successful, and I like the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin V. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The smell is too bad, which is disgusting, and it does not deep clean well
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS REALLU BAD PRODUCT, I DISCARD MY MATTRESS DUE TO THIS!!! The smell is disgusting, after you use it. the whole room will be with disgusting smell. And it never goes away, it will push you to throw your belongings. You do not need to clean it anymore, you can just throw it. This product is so bad, and expensive. Please Please go other choice. I regret to buy it and I feel upset to use it. This is my first time writing review on Amazon. Please get away with this product. IT is the most terrible product I ever get from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: XinShen

customer_reviews.title: avoid this brand.
customer_reviews.text: we could not even use this product, as the bottle just leaks and the sprayer does not work. you would think that they could make a bottle and sprayer that works properly. and to return it have to seal it up otherwise it will leak out in the return shipping. what a terrible product we will not order this brand again as they clearly have poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: If you have a puppy, you need this!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a puppy, you need this!! I’ve tried so many products, but this one actually works. It cleans accidents both big and little easily. And it smells great. The whole room smells great. I’ll buy this (& have) as a loyal customer. Saves me from that nasty smell, having my carpets cleaned, & (unfortunately) some puppy pads. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this product. Has a great scent and I was very hopeful that this would do the trick on a cat urine stain/smell. I had a male cat that sprayed an area, the scent of the product covered it up. I followed all the instructions, but once I came back an hour later after cleaning the area the urine smell had returned. I tried 2 additional times to remove the smell with this product with no success.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Kline

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after reading reviews about it online. It absolutely did not disappoint!! It is the best product I have EVER bought that gets rid of both dog and cat stains and odors of all kinds. I also love the fresh scent. After having numerous dogs and cats, and trying literally EVERY product on the market, this one has been the best! I now also use it for every other stain on my carpets and furniture and so far it has gotten everything out!!
customer_reviews.author: KevinN

customer_reviews.title: Worked really well
customer_reviews.text: We went on vacation and our pet sitter let our two large dogs potty in our house for 10 days without much clean up. We came home to a nightmare. After steam cleaning three times, and trying other products, the smell was still horrid, and the dogs were still regressing because of it. This stuff worked great, and finally cut out the problem smell. The scent it applies isn't severe, and dissipated the next day. I'll definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Jen GSD

customer_reviews.title: Puts a Stop to Puppy Mess
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing that keeps my dog from pooping all over my rugs....she loves rugs...but most of all it keeps her from going anywhere this is sprayed. I sprayed on all my rugs and she stopped going there, she has a doggy door that allows her to go outside by herself whenever she feels like it and she started going in the garage...long story short...sprayed there...she stopped! Hopefully she will now go outside on the grass...haven't found any inside or in the garage in awhile....cross my fingers and thanks Enzyme Cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning + Smell ✔
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly. I live in a college dorm room with my nugget and although he uses his pee pad sometimes there are accidents. He is also small and his foot sometimes steps into the pee and then he proceeds to walk around the floor. ANYWAY THIS.STUFF.WORKS. I walked into my room after a hour and it smelt like toothpaste and it was so delightful.
customer_reviews.author: Bria Lemon-Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pet cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This product works great on pet odors and stains. I have an old rescue dog and she does have accidents. This product is fabulous. I have reorder it 4 times and will continue to order it as long as we have our little munchkin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver with puppies, good to have around with dogs of any age!
customer_reviews.text: We went through bottles of these when our dogs were puppies and still like keeping it around for if they occasionally get sick or have an excitement accident. It always lifts stains from carpet, I like the minty scent and it seems to eliminate it well enough so that the dogs don't come poking around at the spot later. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Not everything it’s hyped up to be!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews for this product, my husband and I were sold! We purchased immediately because we needed to get the odor of cat urine out of our lazy boy. The spray got rid of the smell for a few days, but then it came back. We sprayed it again, and the same thing happened. The spray didn’t work for us unfortunately. I wouldn’t purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Guilietta Estades

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: We adopted a 3 yr old rescue dog the biginning of July 2017. She is a beautiful chocolate lab mix. But not house trained. We tried everything we knew of to clean up her pee and poop from our carpets. Trying to get rid of stain and smell. Browsing Amazon I came across this product. And it WORKS! It a very refreshing mint fragrance and it removed the stain 100%. The fragrance does go away after a few hours but the offensive odor does not return. Very happy with this purchase. On a side note our girl is finally telling us when she needs to go out!
customer_reviews.author: Favorite Old Thing

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work in the slightest
customer_reviews.text: My dog had a UTI, and I found out by her having wretched smelling accidents on my couch. I tried cleaning this with several products, and was super pumped about this one, as the others didn’t get it out easily. This didn’t work at all to get the strong urine smell out of my couch, and it has a really odd smell itself. So my couch smelled like a weird mix of artificial mint and pee. I don’t think this is actually enzymatic, as Nature’s Miracle (a true enzymatic cleaner) did the trick though immediately. I wouldn’t recommend this one to anybody, unless you want your couch or carpet to smell like a weird, mint port a potty.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hawkey

customer_reviews.title: Patience and re-application
customer_reviews.text: Patience is key. I primarily use this on dog vomit (bile) stains. I have found that I have to go through the process several times before the stain is gone. In the past, pet stains, even though they have been cleaned, seem to resurface as discolorations in my carpet. I feel that doesn't happen with this cleaner. We will see as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: lainee

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully Effective
customer_reviews.text: This product worked wonderfully on our carpets where our dogs had peed. The scent is a little strong and stayed on my hands, but it did a great job removing the odor. It’s the only product I’ve used that has been effective on odors and stains. Thanks for Carpet Miracle! We also used the solution for shampooing our carpet and it worked wonderfully too!
customer_reviews.author: mtate2401

customer_reviews.title: Miracle in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: This product is incredible! I have 3 cats, one of which is long haired and has some recent urinary problems. My furniture has been smelling like pee and wanted to get rid of the smell. I've used other products and methods that will get most of it out, but never fully eliminate it. This stuff COMPLETELY removed the odor and you'd never know an animal had ever sat on it. The spray itself doesn't have the greatest smell in the world but it does still smell clean AND a lot better than pee!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Malone

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it. It has a great scent. It definitely removes the odor. And, it definitely stops the pup or adult dog from revisiting the same spot. At first I was very hesitant in buying this because I figured it wouldn’t help. I was comparing it to the ones at the pet store. I was wrong. I’m very happy that I bought it! I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Edukada95

customer_reviews.title: Intense smell
customer_reviews.text: My cat urinated on a chair I really liked. After trying vinegar/baking soda, Woolite and just plain Dawn dish soap I could still smell the urine a bit. I researched and found that "enzymes" are needed to remove cat urine death stench. Found this product featured in an article and bought based on the good reviews. I don't smell cat urine anymore but this product has an intense smell of it's own, very chemical like. I can't tell if it cleaned the cat urine or if it just masked it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great working product. Damaged upon arrival.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this to clean up after our cats’ mess. Works great. We follow the instructions. Clean up carpet very effectively. Only thing is that this latest order arrived damaged. The bottle was wrapped and packged with some packed canned cat food. But the bottle spray nozzle was crushed upon arrival. Instead of returning to Amazon, we thought to just pour the liquid chemical into another spray bottle and still be able to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: feline_graduate_studentTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great clean, minty scent.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs mark a couple of places in my house and other cleaners have seemed to make the urine smell more noticible. This product has a mint scent that covers the urine smell really well. It does not, however, prevent my dogs from re-marking the spots they have marked several times before. My dogs just re-marked a table leg I had cleaned with the product an hour ago. I guess they've just marked it too many times for any product to completely get rid of the issue. I will keep using this product, as the minty scent makes makes my house smell exponetially better than any of the many, many other products I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie McWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Smell gets worse over time
customer_reviews.text: When you first spray it, it doesn't smell awful. It smells minty which is fine. What I noticed is the following day it smells awful. It's a pungy disgustingly strong smell that lingers for days. I can only assume the smell is coming from the enzymes breaking the pet pee down. Try at your own risk!
customer_reviews.author: J. Kobes...

customer_reviews.title: Great pet stain remover
customer_reviews.text: One of the only cleaners that works to remove odor and stains on our carpet from pet accidents or vomit. It has a month scent but it dissipates quickly so it doesn't linger. We've bought multiple bottles over the years and always have one on hand for any carpet stains. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Pet Stain & Odor Miracle - Enzyme Cleaner for Dog and Cat Urine, Feces, Vomit, Drool
feature_bullets: #1 RATED ENZYME CLEANER - Completely removes all pet stains and odors: urine, feces, vomit, & drool.
MULTI-SURFACE FORMULA - carpet, hardwood, furniture, leather, rugs, pet beds, crates, car upholstery.
CHILDREN & PET SAFE - Natural Enzyme formula is the safest way to clean up pet made stains & odors.
HIGHEST QUALITY - Made in the USA & 10% of profits are donated to animal rescues & animal shelters.
GUARANTEE - If you are not 100% in LOVE with S&H Enzyme Cleaner, send it back for a full refund!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars5,150 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
